channel.title: Stadia on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Stadia on TechnoStreet

item.title: The future of cloud gaming is more than the sum of its parts, but it’s still made up of parts
item.description: The future of cloud gaming is more than the sum of its parts, but it’s still made up of parts You may be asking yourself why I’m writing about Google Stadia again after the tech giant announced that it would be dead and gone by the new year.
